ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.managers
Class CacheManager

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.managers.CacheManager

public class CacheManager
extends java.lang.Object

Class responsible for managing local saving of threadsList, threads, and comments. As well as managing and saving the queues of comments and threadComments which are to be posted when internet connection is acquired.

Author:
Artem Chikin

Method Detail

addCommentToQueue

public void addCommentToQueue(Comment comment)
Adds a comment to the Queue of comments to post when Internet connection is acquired. Serializes the queue.

Parameters:
comment - The Comment to be added to the queue.

addThreadCommentToQueue

public void addThreadCommentToQueue(ThreadComment thread)
Adds a threadComment to the Queue of threadComments to post when Internet connection is acquired. Serializes the queue.

Parameters:
thread - The ThreadComment to be added to the queue.

postAll

public void postAll()
Using the ThreadManager, posts all the comments and threadComments in the queue, called once internet connection is acquired.

serializeImage

public void serializeImage(android.graphics.Bitmap image,
                           java.lang.String id)
Serializes a Bitmap into JSON and stores it in the cache.

Parameters:
image - The Bitmap to be serialized.
id - The ID of the image being serialized.

deserializeImage

public android.graphics.Bitmap deserializeImage(java.lang.String id)
Deserializes an image from the cache and returns it.

Parameters:
id - The ID of the comment to retrieve.
Returns:
The deserialized Bitmap.

serializeThreadList

public void serializeThreadList(java.util.ArrayList<ThreadComment> list)
Serialize the list of threads with all the data with the exception of all the comment children of the Thread body comment.

Parameters:
list - The ArrayList of ThreadComments to serialize.

deserializeThreadList

public java.util.ArrayList<ThreadComment> deserializeThreadList()
Deserialize a list of ThreadComment objects without comments.

Returns:
The ArrayList of ThreadComments.

serializeThreadCommentById

public void serializeThreadCommentById(ThreadComment thread)
Serialize ThreadComment object into a file with the file's name being ThreadComment's id.

Parameters:
thread - The ThreadComment to serialize.

deserializeThreadCommentById

public java.util.ArrayList<Comment> deserializeThreadCommentById(java.lang.String id)
Retrieve ThreadComment object by id and return the children of its body comment. This is done because we already have ThreadComment object and its BodyComment from the ThreadComment Deserializers. This deserializer runs when a thread is opened and we need to retrieve comments only from the cache.

Parameters:
id - The id of the ThreadComment to deserialize.
Returns:
An ArrayList of the ThreadComment's body comment's children.
